function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Accelerated spread of virus due to population fleeing or traveling under the radar","Impact":"Increased risk of virus transmission and spread","Mitigation":"Provide support to address ongoing travel needs and livelihood concerns, and provide careful management of travel restrictions","Technologies":"Remote monitoring and tracking technologies, public health communication tools","People":"Populations at risk of spread due to sudden travel restrictions","Owner":"Public health authorities, local government, community leaders"},{"Description":"Limited access to food due to movement restrictions and closure of markets and food vendors","Impact":"Severely reduced ability to access food, potential food shortages","Mitigation":"Implement measures to ensure food distribution, support informal markets, and provide food assistance to vulnerable populations","Technologies":"Remote food delivery systems, mobile market apps, public health communication tools","People":"People living in poor settlements and informal markets","Owner":"Local government, humanitarian organizations, community leaders"},{"Description":"Systemic vulnerabilities in informal settlements including health, social, natural, and infrastructural issues","Impact":"Increased risk of chronic and acute health issues, social concerns, and technological problems","Mitigation":"Address overlapping issues through a multidimensional approach, provide support for health, social, and infrastructural needs, and enhance community resilience","Technologies":"Community health monitoring systems, disaster resilience planning tools, building and infrastructure safety technology","People":"Residents of informal settlements, especially vulnerable groups","Owner":"Local government, community organizations, disaster response teams"}]}
